blueprint.label: Waste Processing
blueprint.description:
Needs manual help:
- merge the 6x6 chest arrays as well as the station buffers
- two offshore pumps placed after waterfill is done
-1000 filter frames (400 in each Assembler 3, 200 in Assembler 2)
- Assembler3 can be changed to Assembler2 and later upgraded.
- mineral water can have 1 or 2 more liquifiers on each side to handled red and blue belts, respctively
